status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: hadoop-yarn-ui re-declares maven-clean-plugin with 3.0 while the rest of the source tree uses 2.5.  This should get synced up.
fields.summary: multiple versions of maven-clean-plugin in use
